column1: #Text=Main Aang Appa Due Huu Katara Momo Sokka Tho says : " Minor Broadsword man Iroh Kya ( vision ) Slim Toph ( vision ) Various Foggy Swamp Tribe members Yue ( vision ) Zuko " Katara says : " Wow , this is amazing to watch . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Kind of makes you realize how insignificant we are . "
#Text=Toph says : " Eh , you 've seen nothing once , you 've seen it a thousand times . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Oh man , you 've never not seen anything like this . "
#Text=Katara says : " The fire is gon na destroy that town ! "
#Text=Aang says : " Not if we can stop it ! "
